pkgmetadata.longdescription: Retime and Analyse Speech Signals // Retime speech signals with a native Waveform Similarity Overlap-Add (WSOLA) implementation translated from the 'TSM toolbox' by Driedger Mller (2014) https://www.audiolabs-erlangen.de/content/resources/MIR/TSMtool box/2014_DriedgerMueller_TSM-Toolbox_DAFX.pdf. Design retimings and pitch (f0) transformations with tidy data and apply them via 'Praat' interface. Produce spectrograms, spectra, and amplitude envelopes. Includes implementation of vocalic speech envelope analysis (fft_spectrum) technique and example data (mm1) from Tilsen, S., Johnson, K. (2008) doi:10.1121/1.2947626.
